_header: This royal King Robert of Sicily land
_description: A story of Kyng Robert of Sicily — one stanza rhyme royal and eighteen quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
This riall kyng Robert of cesile londTo þe churche went on a
                    seynt Iones nyght…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…Vnto þe pepyl & bad þeyme to fle prideWhich
                    caused lucifere from hevyn to helle slyde
TCD432.Attributed Title: A story of Kyng Robert of Cesyle (f. 60)
TCD432.Editions:
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 36-8.
